testcase.name: free CRM app with parameters POM test
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in and is on home page....................................passed Then user hover over contacts link and clicks on New Contact link...........passed Then user enters "Mrs.", "ee1" , "ff2" and "gg3"............................passed Then verify new contact "ee1" and "ff2" created.............................passed Then delete new contact "ee1" and "ff2".....................................passed Then tear down..............................................................passed

testcase.name: free CRM app with parameters POM test 2
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in and is on home page....................................passed Then user hover over contacts link and clicks on New Contact link...........passed Then user enters "Dr.", "ee4" , "ff5" and "gg6".............................passed Then verify new contact "ee4" and "ff5" created.............................passed Then delete new contact "ee4" and "ff5".....................................passed Then tear down..............................................................passed

testcase.name: validate Free CRM Home Page Test
